brand_story.header: WE'VE OPERATED IN THE SHADOWS. NOW WE'RE SETTING THE TERMS.

story.past: For years, we played behind the scenes: silent sourcing partner, discreet distributor, invisible problem-solver.
story.now: NOW? WE'VE BUILT OUR OWN INFRASTRUCTURE, CHANNELS, AND PLAYBOOK. AND WE'RE HERE TO SCALE WITH YOU — ON YOUR TERMS.

opportunity.header: RETURNS. EXCESS. DEADSTOCK. NOT A PROBLEM. AN OPPORTUNITY.
opportunity.tagline: WITH RENEWSTOCK, YOUR IDLE STOCK BECOMES:
opportunity.footer: PRESENT WHERE IT MATTERS. SOLVING WHAT OTHERS DON'T. KNOW THE PRODUCT'S VALUE — AND HOW NOT TO WASTE IT.

clear_process.title: CLEAR PROCESS. NO SURPRISES.
clear_process.description: We stay in active contact with your team. You send available offers — we evaluate them together.
clear_process.details: After reviewing your stock, we come back with a precise, transparent proposal. If aligned, we request a proforma — which we pay upfront and without negotiation. Then we organize transport and get to work.

full_visibility.title: FULL VISIBILITY — AND REAL PARTNERSHIP
full_visibility.partnership: But we go further: We schedule monthly strategy check-ins to align on pricing, markets, and product flow. We're not a one-off solution — we're in this with you.

payment_options.title: FLAT BUYOUT OR SMART REV-SHARE
payment_options.description: Prefer clarity? Take the full upfront offer. Want more upside? Choose revenue share — backed by live reporting.
payment_options.footer: Either way: you stay in control, we handle the rest.

partnership.subheader: WE STAY CLOSE. WE STAY ACCOUNTABLE. WE GROW RESALE WITH YOU.

active_partnership.title: Active Partnership
active_partnership.description: We maintain close, ongoing communication throughout the entire resale lifecycle.

full_accountability.title: Full Accountability
full_accountability.description: Complete transparency with detailed reporting and regular check-ins.

long_term_growth.title: Long-term Growth
long_term_growth.description: Building sustainable resale strategies that evolve with your business.

standards.intro: You set the terms — we follow them.
points: ESG data delivered with every batch
Ready to sign resale agreements — with full commitment
standards.footer: We're here for the long run. Not shortcuts.

uk.title: UK
uk.description: Deep sourcing networks, especially British fashion

balkans.description: Efficient regional B2B and value recovery. (Sort & ship hub in Albania)

eastern_europe.title: Eastern Europe & Russian-speaking countries
eastern_europe.description: We know the rules, the players, and the pathways (Sort & ship hub in Georgia)

description.partner_not_solver: A PARTNER, NOT A PROBLEM SOLVER.
description.dont_need_fix: YOU DON'T NEED TO FIX OVERSTOCK. YOU NEED TO DO SOMETHING BETTER WITH IT.

validation.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.message_min_length: Message must be at least 10 characters long

messages.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you shortly.
messages.error: An error occurred while sending your message. Please try again or contact us directly.

anna.name: Anna Kowalski
anna.description: Visionary leader with 15+ years in renewable energy and circular economy. Anna drives strategic partnerships and sustainable innovation across global markets.

michael.name: Michael Chen
michael.description: Tech innovator specializing in AI-driven supply chain optimization. Michael leads our digital transformation initiatives and data analytics platforms.

sofia.name: Sofia Rodriguez
sofia.description: Operations expert with deep expertise in logistics and quality control. Sofia ensures seamless execution of our resale performance strategies worldwide.

sellers.description: Transform your overstock and returns into immediate revenue. We provide a seamless, transparent solution that protects your brand while maximizing value recovery.

instant_cash_flow.title: INSTANT CASH FLOW
instant_cash_flow.description: Get paid upfront for your inventory. No waiting, no uncertainty—immediate capital injection for your business.

zero_risk_disposal.title: ZERO-RISK DISPOSAL
zero_risk_disposal.description: Complete inventory clearance with full chain of custody. Your products are handled professionally from pickup to final sale.

brand_protection.title: BRAND PROTECTION
brand_protection.description: Controlled resale channels that maintain your brand integrity. No grey market leakage or unauthorized selling.

transparent_reporting.title: TRANSPARENT REPORTING
transparent_reporting.description: Full visibility into the resale process. Track your inventory journey with detailed performance analytics.

cta.title: READY TO TRANSFORM OVERSTOCK?
cta.description: Join leading brands who've discovered the power of strategic resale partnerships.

buyers.description: Access premium inventory at competitive prices through our curated marketplace. We deliver quality products with full traceability and reliable supply chains.

curated_quality.title: CURATED QUALITY
curated_quality.description: Hand-selected inventory from trusted brands. Every product is verified and graded to ensure consistent quality standards.

competitive_pricing.title: COMPETITIVE PRICING
competitive_pricing.description: Access wholesale pricing on premium products. Better margins through our direct brand relationships.

reliable_supply.title: RELIABLE SUPPLY
reliable_supply.description: Consistent inventory flow across multiple product categories. Predictable sourcing for your business planning.

logistics_support.title: LOGISTICS SUPPORT
logistics_support.description: End-to-end fulfillment services. From warehousing to last-mile delivery across our global network.

cta.title: BECOME A TRUSTED BUYER
cta.description: Join our network of verified buyers and access exclusive inventory opportunities.

seo.title: RenewStock - The Circular Partner You Didn't Know You Needed
seo.description: Transform overstock and returns into performance assets. RenewStock delivers real resale performance with end-to-end control, no market leakage, and elevated circularity.
seo.keywords: circular economy, overstock management, returns processing, sustainable resale, inventory optimization, waste reduction

og.title: RenewStock - Transforming Overstock Into Performance Assets
og.description: The circular partner you didn't know you needed. We pay upfront and deliver real resale performance with complete transparency and control.
